mainText:
Steve wasn't only the most creative CEO the world always had: he was  
also a symbol of strengh, inteliggence and hope. We'll trully miss  
Steve here, but at least im happy to know that he could see Iphone 4S  
be launched, cause we know how important it was to him. Even sick, he  
worked cause he knew how important it was to us, and we thank he  
sooooo much.
author: Priscila
